Subject: Neo Beast Wars

From: Teltoli SilverFlight <teltoli@...>

-Teltoli-

While waiting for a response from Carnage, she hears a voice come over her com link, Liono, saying all the Maximals should get back to the Ark. She groaned and turned to Carnage..

"Sorry, Carnage, but ole Liono's calling all the Maximals.. I'll see you sometime later, eh!"

She opens her wings, runs, and takes off, flying to the Ark.
